Instance.description: Base class for Situations that will be constructed, primarily by designers, in the Object Editor. These situations are comprised of a linear sequence of phases of a fixed duration.

TunableList.name: _exit_conditions
TunableList.description: A list of condition groups of which if any are satisfied, the group is satisfied.

TunableList.name: conditions
TunableList.description: A list of conditions that all must be satisfied for the group to be considered satisfied.

TunableVariant.description: A condition for a situation or single phase.

TunableVariant.name: event_custom_key

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: When registering the event listener, it will only listen for events with this key.

Tunable.name: statistic
Tunable.description: The statistic that the event must carry as custom key.

Tunable.description: Minimum amount of time (in sim minutes) for this condition to be satisfied.

Tunable.name: duration
Tunable.description: How long the phase will last in sim minutes. 0 means forever, which should be used on the last phase of the situation.
